hero.title: Gearizen
hero.subHeadline: Discover 20+ free, privacy-first web tools for developers, creators and everyone—no signup, no tracking, 100% client-side.

features.title: JSON Formatter & Validator
features.description: Validate, beautify, minify and lint JSON instantly in your browser with real-time error reporting.

features.title: Strong Password Generator
features.description: Instantly generate secure, customizable passwords with options for length, complexity and entropy visualization.

features.title: Data Converter
features.description: Transform CSV, JSON, YAML or XML data in seconds—even large files—all client-side and offline.

features.title: Code Formatter & Minifier
features.description: Beautify or compress your HTML, CSS and JavaScript for better readability or performance—no server needed.

features.title: PDF Toolkit
features.description: Shrink PDF sizes without quality loss and extract text to Word documents entirely in-browser.

features.title: SEO Meta Tag Generator
features.description: Generate optimized meta tags, Open Graph and Twitter card snippets to boost search visibility and social sharing.

features.title: QR Code Generator
features.description: Create high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, vCards and Wi-Fi credentials with color and size options.

features.title: Suggest a Tool
features.description: Have an idea for a new tool? Let us know and we’ll build it—your feedback powers Gearizen’s roadmap.
